comments: Also: the nonpositive integers, listed with offset = 0 and in decreasing order.An involution: the function is its own inverse, A001489 o A001489 = A001478, the identity function on N = {0, 1, 2, 3, ...}. - _M. F. Hasler_, Jan 18 2015
